title: Pixel 3a not showing Chromecast icon but but my Samsung s9 does show it
content:
My new Pixel 3a doesn't show the Chromecast icon in chrome browser videos but my Samsung so does show the icon and works fine.
My Chromecast is linked and works in other apps but when I try to cast a video from inside the chrome browser there is not an icon to cast. Is there a setting I haven't turned on or something? I've only had the Pixel for a few weeks but I can find a solution anywhere specific to the Pixel. I love the phone but this is just an odd issue considering it's all Google.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
